history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: incl_refl,redln_cons_gen.

ctx: intros a aP R Q nzaa ob arc b inb nzb.
exceptions.tactic: apply ob in nzb as ob1.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) R" on hypothesis of type "~ BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM b".

ctx: intros a aP R Q nzaa ob arc b inb nzb.
exceptions.tactic: apply ob1 in nzb as ob2.
exceptions.exn: The reference ob1 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros a aP R Q nzaa ob arc b inb nzb.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (redln_cons_gen aP R Q a b b inb inb arc (incl_refl _)).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, R, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) nzaa : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) -> False ob : OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) R arc : forall b c : poly A0 eqA ltM, In b aP -> In c aP -> redIn b c aP (a :: Q) R b : poly A0 eqA ltM inb : In b aP nzb : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM b -> False The term "inb" has type "In b aP" while it is expected to have type "In a aP".

original: intros a aP R Q nzaa ob arc b inb nzb. apply ob in nzb as ob1. apply ob1 in nzb as ob2. destruct (redln_cons_gen aP R Q a b b inb inb arc (incl_refl _)). apply redln_cons with aP R Q a b b; auto. now apply arc in inb.
